Operational Situation: Highway driving at speeds >100 km/h with preceding vehicle
Hazardous Event: Loss of forward object detection leading to failure to brake for a stationary or slow-moving vehicle ahead
Safety Goal: SG-01: The Forward Perception System shall detect all relevant objects in the driving path within the specified detection range
Safe State: Controlled deceleration to safe stop with hazard lights activated

Operational Situation: Urban driving at 50 km/h with pedestrian crossing
Hazardous Event: Unintended full braking force application without valid obstacle causing rear-end collision or occupant injury
Safety Goal: SG-02: The Emergency Braking System shall not apply braking force unless a valid collision threat is confirmed by at least two independent sensor modalities
Safe State: Controlled release of braking force and driver notification via HMI

Operational Situation: Urban driving at 30-60 km/h with approaching emergency vehicle using siren
Hazardous Event: Failure to detect or misclassification of emergency vehicle siren/horn audio leading to failure to yield to emergency vehicle
Safety Goal: SG-03: The audio input path shall provide qualified siren/horn detection data to Alpamayo such that the autonomous vehicle can detect and yield to emergency vehicles within the operational design domain
Safe State: Vision-only emergency vehicle detection via camera-based flashing light detection; audio input marked NOT_QUALIFIED
